actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 907 of title 37, United States Code, relating to pay and allowances of enlisted members of the uniform services who are appointed officers.

summary.text: Revises the pay and allowances of enlisted members of the uniformed services who are appointed officers and warrant officers who are appointed as commissioned officers.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 907 of title 37, United States Code, relating to pay and allowances of enlisted members of the uniform services who are appointed officers.
